author: Linda Givetash and Leou Chen and Nancy Ing and Matthew Mulligan and Associated Press
title: Millions wake up to tightening lockdowns as restrictions lift at pandemic's epicenter
description: As millions of people across the globe adjust to life under lockdown, the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic in China is seeing restrictions eased.
content:
LONDON As millions of people across the globe adjusted to life under tightening lockdowns on Tuesday, at the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic in China restrictions began to slowly ease.
The lockdown imposed on the city of Wuhan, where COVID19 was first … [+3742 chars]
